name: Gravitree: the ROOT that never was
name_original: Gravitree: the ROOT that never was
description:
Go back in time to change the historical event where Isaac Newton formulates the theory of universal gravity. He being the ROOT cause for the subject of theoretical physics in the high school curriculum, Sam with the help of Lunas, the theologist attempts to erase the historical event from happening. 

Play-Through hints, 

1. The ROOT that never was ...is a narrative-based RPG Strategy game. 

2. After acquiring the 'Wandaroot', Sam receives the power to slow down time (F) and reverse the time up to 12 secs (E) while he is on the quest to find Gravitree- the apple tree Newton sat under. 

3. The power acquired with Wandaroot can only be used 3 times each within the game. 

4. Lunas, the theologist will be assisting you as you play through your quest to manipulate history. 

5. There are 3 levels in the game.
